extendedInfo.description: SlideIT keyboard is an excellent tool for entering text, replacing your touchscreen keyboard. SlideIT keyboard enables users to dramatically improve writing speed with practically no learning curve.Instead of entering text by tapping on the keyboard letters, SlideIT keyboard eases texting by sliding a finger along the keyboard letters, while the words âmagicallyâ appear on the screen.Love SlideIT? Please give us a 5-star Google Play rating and review. Weâre always trying to make SlideIT better. If you have questions or suggestions, please share them with us! support@mobiletextinput.comSlideIT keyboard version 7 includes many new features and fixes.â NEW!! SlideIT 7 now supports A.I.Type next-word prediction with many languages! Many keyboard skins for SlideIT are available for free download from the Android Market.SlideIT keyboard fully supports all Android versions from 2.2  and up, including tablets and Android 4.2 (Jelly Bean).With over 6,000,000 downloads, SlideIT keyboard has been an Android bestseller and selected as an editor's choice by Google.Among SlideIT's great features:â Smart predictions and disambiguationâ Over 70 language packs and layoutsâ More than 60 skinsâ Speech-to-textâ Keyboard customizationâ Import contacts from your phoneSlideIT's many great features make it the ultimate time-saving keyboard for Android devices. Writing e-mail, SMS messaging or just chating with your friends on a small touchscreen is now easy and fun!The best keyboard on the Android Market!~~~This is the Trial version for 15 days.Reviews:ââ¦for one-handed text entry, SlideIT Keyboard is the current king of the hill.â - PCWorld, August 2010ââ¦Best keyboard around. A must have for the Android. It is the best app that I've boughtâ - SlideIT user reviewâCan I just say THANK YOU, a million times, I love this app and you saved me big time. I just switched from droid2 to droidx2 after 1 day, swype malfunctioned, and vz wireless tech support led me to you. He said it was way better anyhow, and he was right, customizable and all! Omg, I'm in heaven O:-)â - Customer feedbackLANGUAGE SUPPORT:SlideIT keyboard can load many languages, and you can switch between them with the press of a button!Afrikaans â Afrikaanse sleutelbord,Albanian â TastierÃ«s shqipe,Arabic â ÙÙØ­Ø© Ø§ÙÙÙØ§ØªÙØ­ Ø§ÙØ¹Ø±Ø¨ÙØ©,Belorussian â ÐÐµÐ»Ð°ÑÑÑÐºÑÑ ÐºÐ»Ð°Ð²ÑÑÑÑÑÑ,Brazilian â Teclado brasileiro,Bulgarian â ÐÑÐ»Ð³Ð°ÑÑÐºÐ° ÐºÐ»Ð°Ð²Ð¸Ð°ÑÑÑÐ°,Catalan â CatalÃ  teclat,Czech -ÄeskÃ¡ klÃ¡vesnice,Croatian â Hrvatske tipkovnice,Danish â Danske tastatur,Dutch -Nederlands toetsenbord,Estonian â Eesti klaviatuur,Finnish â Suomen nÃ¤ppÃ¤imistÃ¶,French â Clavier franÃ§ais,German â Deutsch Tastatur,Greek â ÎÎ»Î»Î·Î½Î¹ÎºÏ ÏÎ»Î·ÎºÏÏÎ¿Î»ÏÎ³Î¹Î¿,Hebrew â ××§×××ª ×¢××¨××ª,Hungarian â Magyar billentyÅ±zet,Icelandic â Ãslenska lyklaborÃ°iÃ°,Indonesian â Bahasa Indonesia keyboard,Italian â Tastiera italiana,Korean - íêµ­ì´ í¤ë³´ë,Latvian â Latvijas klaviatÅ«ras,Lithuanian â Lietuvos klaviatÅ«ros,Norwegian â Norsk tastatur,Persian â ØµÙØ­Ù Ú©ÙÛØ¯ ÙØ§Ø±Ø³Û,Polish â Polska klawiatura,Portuguese â Teclado PortuguÃªs,Romanian â RomÃ¢n tastaturÄ,Russian â Ð ÑÑÑÐºÐ°Ñ ÐºÐ»Ð°Ð²Ð¸Ð°ÑÑÑÐ°,Serbian â cyrillic â ÐÐ¸ÑÐ¸Ð»Ð¸ÑÐ° ÑÑÐ¿ÑÐºÐ° ÑÐ°ÑÑÐ°ÑÑÑÐ°,Serbian â latin â Latin srpskoj tastaturi,Slovak â SlovenskÃ¡ klÃ¡vesnica,Slovenian â Slovensko tipkovnico,Spanish â Teclado en espaÃ±ol,Swahili â Swahili keyboard,Swedish â Svenskt tangentbord,Turkish â TÃ¼rkÃ§e klavye,Ukrainian -Ð£ÐºÑÐ°ÑÐ½ÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ ÐºÐ»Ð°Ð²ÑÐ°ÑÑÑÐ¸.These packs include a variety of keyboard layouts: QWERTY, QWERTZ, AZERTY, COLEMAK and DVORAK.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: its awesome because my entire phone is customized so this keyboard fits right in because of the skins and themes I can choose from keeps everything pink how I need it it also gives me the advantage of using spell check and swype this is the first customisable keyboard that offers so many options I love it
reviews.author: Deonae Ewin

reviews.title: Best keyboard I\'ve ever used.
reviews.comment: Amazing spelling.... Many skins.... And... All you need to do is slide. U don\'t need to press space everytime between. Love how the letters pop up when u tap. It\'s nice.... Quick and easy. Now going to share with friends.
reviews.author: Derek Phan

reviews.title: Uninstalling
reviews.comment: Very slow. I end up having to use the voice command rather than the swiping.
reviews.author: Sarah Oxford

reviews.title: Mr Awesome
reviews.comment: When Where I used it I taught that was in the 30 th century. It gave me the feeling of the future
reviews.author: Jash Arora

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Nice keyboards and keyboard skins. I can easily text my mother. Everything i text. It\'s amazing. Nice app. I\'ll give 5 stars.
reviews.author: Ezekiel Angelo Cruise

reviews.title: Trial, not free and very slow
reviews.comment: This is a trial version and should not be called a free version. Also, it is slow. So slow that if something is input wrongly, you would have already typed ahead and would have to come back and delete a lot.
reviews.author: Kaushik Das

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good good good good....
reviews.author: Anurag Vijeta

reviews.title: \"Out standing\"
reviews.comment: Perfect just what I\'ve been look ing for it livens up my phone. Please make more skin\'s blue
reviews.author: ryan cooper

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It goes faster than typing one letter at a time
reviews.author: Stormy Naus

reviews.title: swype replacement
reviews.comment: i used swype for years until it starting lagging badly on my phone.  this app is better and has a ton of options and things to tweak.  my only request is to add an option where long holding backspace deletes the full previous word and continuing to hold it deletes several more whole words at a time quickly.  add that option and i\'m buying this app.  great work devs.
reviews.author: private private

reviews.comment: I love best keyboard iv used
reviews.author: Chelsea Portillo

reviews.title: Impressed!
reviews.comment: Using it right now. Was kinda sad that my phone didn\'t come with swype but I gave this a try and I\'m really pleased! I recommend x 100.
reviews.author: Nikki Ogunnoiki

reviews.title: This is the best Swype keyboard I\'ve found
reviews.comment: I have tried out most of the other free Swype keyboards and this was the only one that would actually get the words right. I tried going back to the standard keyboard after the 30 day trial and it didn\'t feel right do I ended up buying the full version.
reviews.author: eric hyde

reviews.title: Mostly love it.. But...
reviews.comment: Signing into accounts is a monster! I can just about manage on my phone but am finding it impossible with my tablet to sign in to my Yahoo account because it takes over completely and my very secure upper and lower case alpha numeric password keeps being altered! Also, I am British and would appreciate a pound sign instead of or as well as a dollar sign, please.  Other than these problems, great App
reviews.author: Roslyn Lamb

reviews.title: It\'s good
reviews.comment: But I\'m concerned about privacy when the policy says they can collect my personal data.
reviews.author: Wael Shoukry

reviews.title: misleading not FREe
reviews.comment: love the skins... liked how easy it was to use...hate that it says FREE but its not...only got like 1 week trial very misleading...dissatified
reviews.author: Kim Roach

reviews.title: Features are great, but the prediction sucks
reviews.comment: I love all the features they have, but the prediction is terrible compared to Swype - and I think Swype\'s could be much better than it is. It is also not as responsive as Swype.I prefer Swype and SwiftKey over SlideIt.
reviews.author: Dave Allison

reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard
reviews.comment: I hope you make it free with limited option, not trial with expiration. Thanks!
reviews.author: Ronilo Jasareno

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this app & so far I am pleased. Plenty of customization options. I love the emoticon keyboard. Definite purchase when my trial runs out.
reviews.author: Amanda Day
